p: The chemical composition of A. factorovskyi was phytochemically examined by GC-MS analysis; its major active constituents are listed in Table 1. The chemical structure of the resulted compounds was drawn by the free online software MolView https://molview.org/. The GC-MS analysis confirmed the presence of multiple biomolecules including phenolics and terpenoids, which are known for their antioxidant and antimicrobial activities, and are essential for the combination with nanoparticles [ 10].
